articles.description: Australia’s Deputy Chief Medical Officer, Professor Michael Kidd spoke about what’s being done to prevent this from happening.
articles.content:
Very ill COVID-19 patients could be given a blood-thinning drug after a number of reasonably young sufferers have had strokes.
Australias deputy chief medical officer spoke to reporters on Saturday about the use of anti-clotting drugs for COVID patients whov… [+983 chars]

articles.title: 'It only takes one': Second spike warning after state's virus milestone - Yahoo News Australia
articles.description: South Australia marked 11 days with no new cases of coronavirus on Sunday.
articles.content:
South Australians have been warned not to become complacent when protecting themselves and others against the coronavirus.
